name: evomp
description: A GT-MP Multiplayer framework. Frontend only.
author: Sascha <sascha8a@gmail.com>

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node Build/web.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config Build/webpack.config.js && node Build/createMeta && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tslint -c tslint.json --project tsconfig.json './EvoMp/*/Client/*.ts' -t stylish
scripts.dev: start cross-env NODE_ENV=development node Build/Web.js && start cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config Build/webpack.config.js --watch && start cross-env NODE_ENV=development node Build/createMeta
